net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.renderer

Class AbstractBundleLinkRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.renderer.AbstractBundleLinkRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, BundleRenderer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CSSHTMLBundleLinkRenderer, JavascriptHTMLBundleLinkRenderer

    public abstract class AbstractBundleLinkRenderer
extends Object
implements BundleRenderer
    Abstract base class for implementations of a link renderer.
    Author:
    Jordi Hernández Sellés, Matt Ruby, Ibrahim Chaehoi
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
